Anotification is a message you can display as an icon at the top of the device which we call notification bar or status bar.
You have learnt Android Intent, which is an object carrying an intent ie. message from one component to another component with-in the application or outside the applicatio
A widget is a small gadget or control of your android application placed on the home screen.
"This text can be changed in the application"

JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation.It is an independent data exchange format and is the best alternative for XML. This chapter show how to parse the JSON file and extract necessary information from it.
